findings.title: QSP-25 Tokens Can Get Frozen in Contracts
findings.description: The contracts do not have specific functions to pull tokens or ETH sent on purpose or by mistake.

findings.title: QSP-1 Inappropriate Validation of Liquidation Fees Can Possibly Lead the Liquidity Pool to Be Drained
findings.description: Liquidation fees are applied to the amounts returned by DiamondFactoryV3._removeUniLiquidity() which are equivalent to the initial want token deposit minus the reserve and the amount borrowed with leverage, leading users or keepers to get back a value even higher than the initial deposit.

findings.title: QSP-20 Functions find() and get() with Complex Logic
findings.description: The function `find()` of the library `Positions` returns `true` if a position exists; reverts if a position doesn't exist, never returning `false` and instead reverting.
